objective: To identify the geometric relationships and properties among the rectangles ABCD and EFGH, and the circle connecting points A, D, H, G.

objective: To calculate the lengths of relevant line segments based on the relationships and properties identified in sub-task 1 and using the dimensions provided for the rectangles.

abstracted_objective: To derive quantitative measurements or outcomes based on previously identified properties and relationships, harnessing applicable constants or dimensions.

objective: To deduce the length of segment CE by utilizing the outputs from sub-task 1 (geometric properties) and sub-task 2 (length calculations) along with the rules governing circles and rectangles.
